{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Social Media Executive & CRM Officer",
  "description": "ShogxyPro Outsourcing is a forward-thinking HR and talent solutions firm based in Lagos, Nigeria. We specialize in recruitment, staff outsourcing, compliance management, and workforce development for businesses across various industries.

Our goal is simple: help organizations grow by connecting them with the right people and building compliant, efficient HR systems. We serve startups, SMEs, and large enterprises looking to scale without the burden of in-house HR challenges.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Social Media Executive &amp; CRM Officer

Job Locations:&nbsp;Ikeja - Lagos, Ibadan - Oyo, Kano and Port Harcourt - Rivers&nbsp;
Employment Type: Full-time

Summary


	Are you a dynamic sales professional with experience in trading niche commodities like Corn Starch and Milk Powder?
	We&rsquo;re looking for a results-driven Sales Executive to join our team and drive growth in this specialized market.


Roles &amp; Responsibilities
Sales Development:


	Design and implement effective sales strategies to meet volume and revenue goals.
	Identify new market opportunities and drive product penetration.


Relationship Management:


	Build and maintain strong relationships with trade partners and customers.
	Ensure customer satisfaction and long-term business sustainability.


Market Monitoring


	Track sales performance and market trends.
	Provide timely and accurate reports to support strategic decisions.


Requirements


	Minimum of a Degree or Diploma in a relevant field.
	Proven experience in trading Corn Starch and Milk Powder, with strong industry knowledge.
	Familiarity with key players in the industry including traders and wholesalers.
	Age: Preferably below 35 years.
	Strong geographical knowledge of Southern and Northern Nigeria.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;ibukun.fakoya@valencyafrica.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

  "validThrough": "2026-01-01",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",

    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "ShogxyPro Outsourcing"
    
  },

Social Media Executive & CRM Officer Job at ShogxyPro Outsourcing




        
    

        
        ShogxyPro Outsourcing is a forward-thinking HR and talent solutions firm based in Lagos, Nigeria. We specialize in recruitment, staff outsourcing, compliance management, and workforce development for businesses across various industries.

Our goal is simple: help organizations grow by connecting them with the right people and building compliant, efficient HR systems. We serve startups, SMEs, and large enterprises looking to scale without the burden of in-house HR challenges.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Social Media Executive & CRM Officer

Job Locations: Ikeja - Lagos, Ibadan - Oyo, Kano and Port Harcourt - Rivers 
Employment Type: Full-time
     

            
    



Summary


	Are you a dynamic sales professional with experience in trading niche commodities like Corn Starch and Milk Powder?
	We’re looking for a results-driven Sales Executive to join our team and drive growth in this specialized market.


Roles & Responsibilities
Sales Development:


	Design and implement effective sales strategies to meet volume and revenue goals.
	Identify new market opportunities and drive product penetration.


Relationship Management:


	Build and maintain strong relationships with trade partners and customers.
	Ensure customer satisfaction and long-term business sustainability.


Market Monitoring


	Track sales performance and market trends.
	Provide timely and accurate reports to support strategic decisions.


Requirements


	Minimum of a Degree or Diploma in a relevant field.
	Proven experience in trading Corn Starch and Milk Powder, with strong industry knowledge.
	Familiarity with key players in the industry including traders and wholesalers.
	Age: Preferably below 35 years.
	Strong geographical knowledge of Southern and Northern Nigeria.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: ibukun.fakoya@valencyafrica.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Senior Software Engineer (.Net)",
  "description": "Advansio Interactive is a technology-driven ideas and innovations company based in Lagos State, Nigeria.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Senior Software Engineer (.Net)

Job Location:&nbsp;Yaba, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Work Mode: Hybrid

Role Description


	This is a full-time Hybrid role for a Senior Backend Software Developer (.Net / C#) at Advansio Interactive.
	The Backend Developer will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining server-side applications and services using .NET and C#. The role involves building secure, scalable APIs, integrating databases, and ensuring high system performance to support fintech products and platform.
	The role involves working on-site twice a week, in Lagos State, Nigeria.


Key Responsibilities


	Design, develop, and maintain scalable backend systems and APIs.
	Collaborate with frontend developers, product managers, and QA to deliver robust solutions.
	Optimize application performance and troubleshoot issues.
	Ensure code quality, security, and adherence to best practices.
	Work with databases and cloud technologies to support application functionality.


Requirements


	Proficiency in .NET / C# development with at least 5 years&rsquo; hands - on experience
	Strong knowledge of RESTful API development and integration.
	Hands-on experience with SQL databases (MSSQL, PostgreSQL, or MySQL).
	Familiarity with cloud platforms (Azure, AWS, or GCP) is an added advantage.
	Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.


Remuneration
N500,000.00 to N700,000.00 monthly.

Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their applications to:&nbsp;hr@advansio.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.",

  "validThrough": "2026-01-08",

Senior Software Engineer (.Net) Job at Advansio Interactive Limited




        
    

        
        Advansio Interactive is a technology-driven ideas and innovations company based in Lagos State, Nigeria.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Senior Software Engineer (.Net)

Job Location: Yaba, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Work Mode: Hybrid

Role Description
     

            
    




	This is a full-time Hybrid role for a Senior Backend Software Developer (.Net / C#) at Advansio Interactive.
	The Backend Developer will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining server-side applications and services using .NET and C#. The role involves building secure, scalable APIs, integrating databases, and ensuring high system performance to support fintech products and platform.
	The role involves working on-site twice a week, in Lagos State, Nigeria.


Key Responsibilities


	Design, develop, and maintain scalable backend systems and APIs.
	Collaborate with frontend developers, product managers, and QA to deliver robust solutions.
	Optimize application performance and troubleshoot issues.
	Ensure code quality, security, and adherence to best practices.
	Work with databases and cloud technologies to support application functionality.


Requirements


	Proficiency in .NET / C# development with at least 5 years’ hands - on experience
	Strong knowledge of RESTful API development and integration.
	Hands-on experience with SQL databases (MSSQL, PostgreSQL, or MySQL).
	Familiarity with cloud platforms (Azure, AWS, or GCP) is an added advantage.
	Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.


Remuneration
N500,000.00 to N700,000.00 monthly.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their applications to: hr@advansio.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Senior Brand Manager",
  "description": "Deloxe is a forward-thinking human resources consulting firm dedicated to optimizing workforce potential and driving organizational success. We deliver innovative HR solutions that empower businesses, enhance employee experiences, and foster sustainable growth. At Deloxe, we are committed to transforming workplaces through strategic HR management and cutting-edge solutions that maximize efficiency and impact.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Senior Brand Manager
Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

About the Role


	We are seeking a Senior Brand Manager with a proven track record in driving new milk product innovation from concept to successful market commercialization within the FMCG sector.
	This strategic role requires a rare blend of commercial acumen, technical understanding of dairy product development, and strong project leadership to deliver sustainable brand growth, innovation excellence, and profitability.
	The ideal candidate will act as the end-to-end owner of the new product pipeline, leading cross-functional teams and external partners to translate consumer insights into winning dairy products.


Key Responsibilities


	Own end-to-end new milk product development (concept &rarr; launch)
	Drive consumer insights &amp; brand strategy
	Lead cross-functional teams (R&amp;D, Quality, Finance, Supply Chain)
	Develop business cases, P&amp;L &amp; COGS models
	Secure scalable manufacturing partnerships.


Success Metrics


	80% revenue from new products
	95% on-time launches
	80%+ gross margin on new products
	Zero regulatory or compliance failures.


Key Requirements


	5+ years of FMCG brand &amp; product development experience
	Strong dairy / beverage innovation background preferred
	Proven track record of successful product launches
	Strong commercial, financial &amp; project leadership skills.
",
  "datePosted": "2025-12-17",
  "validThrough": "2025-12-20",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",
  "hiringOrganization": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "Deloxe"
    
  },
  "jobLocation": {
    "@type": "Place",
    "address": {

Senior Brand Manager Job at Deloxe




        
    

        
        Deloxe is a forward-thinking human resources consulting firm dedicated to optimizing workforce potential and driving organizational success. We deliver innovative HR solutions that empower businesses, enhance employee experiences, and foster sustainable growth. At Deloxe, we are committed to transforming workplaces through strategic HR management and cutting-edge solutions that maximize efficiency and impact.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Senior Brand Manager
Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

About the Role
     

            
    




	We are seeking a Senior Brand Manager with a proven track record in driving new milk product innovation from concept to successful market commercialization within the FMCG sector.
	This strategic role requires a rare blend of commercial acumen, technical understanding of dairy product development, and strong project leadership to deliver sustainable brand growth, innovation excellence, and profitability.
	The ideal candidate will act as the end-to-end owner of the new product pipeline, leading cross-functional teams and external partners to translate consumer insights into winning dairy products.


Key Responsibilities


	Own end-to-end new milk product development (concept → launch)
	Drive consumer insights & brand strategy
	Lead cross-functional teams (R&D, Quality, Finance, Supply Chain)
	Develop business cases, P&L & COGS models
	Secure scalable manufacturing partnerships.


Success Metrics


	80% revenue from new products
	95% on-time launches
	80%+ gross margin on new products
	Zero regulatory or compliance failures.


Key Requirements


	5+ years of FMCG brand & product development experience
	Strong dairy / beverage innovation background preferred
	Proven track record of successful product launches
	Strong commercial, financial & project leadership skills.
